1.title: Chaos: Part One
1.plot: International Rescue have their hands full when the Hood's newly formed Chaos Crew begin causing trouble around the globe.

2.title: Chaos: Part Two
2.plot: The GDF's new rescue bots leave International Rescue without work, but when when of them malfunctions the whole team is needed to save the day and defeat the Chaos Crew.

3.title: Path of Destruction
3.plot: International Rescue intervene when Fuse attempts to hijack a convoy carrying volatile cargo.

4.title: Night and Day
4.plot: After a rocket capsule explodes a mining crawler breaks down causing a team to be trapped. Alan and Brains must quickly help them repair it before the sun rises and destroys the capsule.

5.title: Growing Pains
5.plot: Poor Ned Tedford is in trouble once again, this time the Chaos Crew are hoping to steal the orchard growth serum inside the highly secure Global Seed Vault. Kayo and Captain Rigby step in to stop them but things soon take a turn for the worse when a virus infects EOS.

6.title: Life Signs
6.plot: Captain Taylor and Professor Karim are trapped in a cave on Mars. Virgil joins Alan in Thunderbird 3 to mount a rescue mission using a specialized Dragonfly Pod.

7.title: Rally Raid
7.plot: FAB1 is competing in a the Corona 5000 against the new BR2. Lady Penelope is navigator to professional rally driver Jensen Hunt. Parker and Sherbert invite themselves along for the ride. But the Chaos Crew is after the BR2's turbo computer.

8.title: Crash Course
8.plot: Two freighters crash into each other while docking and become interlocked and their combined cargo could turn explosive. Thunderbird 3 heads into low-Earth orbit to rescue the bickering pilots.

9.title: Flame Out
9.plot: Virgil is exited to meet his hero, fire fighter Kip Harris. Together with Gordon, they have to cap a leak at a hydro-methane facility.

18.title: Getaway
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Ring of Fire: Part 1
1.plot: A powerful underwater seaquake turns a busy day for International Rescue into a perilous one. Gordon's mission is to rescue a research team trapped in an undersea lab, but in doing so he discovers a chain of seismic destabilisers positioned along the bottom of the ocean floor. Lady Penelope is contacted to help the Thunderbirds find the person responsible.

2.title: Ring of Fire: Part 2
2.plot: John and Brains must track down the source of the seismic destabilisers. Meanwhile Scott and Virgil race to Taiwan when one of the undersea quakes destabilizes a solar collector dish in Taipe. When the sun rises on the dish it will reflect on the city burning it to the ground. All the while Lady Penelope tracks down a fearsome new adversary...

3.title: Space Race
3.plot: Alan is on space junk duty. Things take a turn when one of the pieces of debris turns out to be a heat-seeking SAT-MINE that activates and locks onto TB3's heat signature. Alan pulls some incredible moves in order to dodge the mine, but he can only outfly it for so long before exhaustion kicks in. Back on Earth, Lady Penelope and Parker implement a plan to sneak into a top-secret storage facility and find the mine's deactivation code. They succeed and the mine powers down before TB3 is destroyed.

4.title: Crosscut
4.plot: Scott rushes in with Thunderbird 1 to check out an unusual radiation spike from a remote corner of Africa - and discovers the source to be a leak of unstable uranium.

5.title: Fireflash
5.plot: Kayo departs on the newly upgraded Fireflash plane, but soon discovers that there is a saboteur on board. Meanwhile Virgil, Allan and Gordon must help save the passengers from harm.

6.title: Unplugged
6.plot: An anti-technology group called The Luddites power up an electromagnetic pulse device underneath London, crippling everything that uses electricity.

7.title: Runaway
7.plot: When a trains systems go offline and it begins to crash, Scott and Brains must work together to get it's engines back online. Even if it means Brains facing his fears.

8.title: EOS
8.plot: A series of cascading equipment failures leads John to realise that rogue A.I. has gained control of Thunderbird 5. The programme is sending false monitor images to Tracy Island to deceive the other brothers. John finally gets through to Lady Penelope and informs her of the situation.

9.title: Slingshot
9.plot: A malfunction at a mining operation sends an large asteroid careening towards the sun, endangering mining crewman Ned Tedford. Alan and Kayo deploy Thunderbird 3 for the rescue mission, but a rogue solar flare knocks out their sensors. As they land near the mine, and must find a way to alter the asteroid's trajectory so that it slingshots around the sun instead of crashing into it.

10.title: Tunnels of Time
10.plot: When Lady Penelope, Parker and a smitten Gordon investigate a newly discovered temple in South America, they soon fall foul of ancient booby traps. TB1 and TB2 investigate.

11.title: Skyhook
11.plot: An unsafe weather station is entering Earth's upper atmosphere and out of control. After TB1, TB2 and TB3 all fail to rescue the occupants, John on TB5 suggests a hazardous solution.

12.title: Under Pressure
12.plot: A deep sea crawling toxic waste plant, has a fire, leaving it out of control and heading for a undersea chasm. TB2 and TB4 attempt to rescue crewman Ned Tedford. Lady Penelope determines the cause of the disaster is The Hood.

13.title: Heavy Metal
13.plot: Brains and Alan visit the Supreme Hadron Collider in Switzerland. When activated a gravity well is formed affecting aircraft, TB1, TB2 and TB5. A unique solution is suggested by combining all vehicles, but not as they were designed.

14.title: Falling Skies
14.plot: Brains has designed an orbiting luxury hotel. It malfunctions sending it and its guests hurtling towards Earth.

15.title: Relic
15.plot: Tracy family members, Alan and Scott, travel to the far side of the moon to rescue one of their father's old friends from an almost-decomissioned base at risk of being destroyed by a meteor shower.

16.title: Breakdown
16.plot: Virgil attempts to rescue a mining crew trapped inside a glacier that's breaking apart, but the scientist in charge of the project refuses to leave.

17.title: Heist Society
17.plot: The Hood traps Lady Penelope and Parker inside a flooding underwater hyper-loop train during a high stakes robbery.

18.title: Recharge
18.plot: After back to back missions, the crew are ready for some downtime, but a call from John makes them jump back into action. A device used to harness the energy from Aurora Borealis is malfunctioning. TB1andTB2 head to the North Pole along with a new field agent.

19.title: Extraction
19.plot: Virgil and Gordon must rescue a seismologist and his son from underneath the surface of a collapsed mining operation.

20.title: The Hexpert
20.plot: Professor Alice Lungren accidentally locks herself inside a vault which is being used to store unstable matter. There is only one person who has successfully broken into a vault like this - Parker.

21.title: Comet Chasers
21.plot: Virgil and Alan intervene with Thunderbird 3 when a thrill seeking businessman flies his extravagant space yacht directly into the tail of Halley's Comet.

22.title: Designated Driver
22.plot: Alan's driving lessons with Parker in Penelope's limousine get serious when burglars kidnap Lady Penelope and Aunt Sylvia.

23.title: Chain of Command
23.plot: During a joint operation between International Rescue and the Global Defence Force, a series of mishaps nearly ends in disaster.

24.title: Touch and Go
24.plot: In the Arizona desert there is a facility known as CATCH, from where all air traffic in North America is controlled. Scott and Virgil handle a rescue mission involving a mid-air plane collision while Kayo infiltrates the bunker with the help of Thunderbird Shadow. Then Kayo realises that this is all part of a much bigger plan by the Hood.

25.title: Undercover
25.plot: An undercover sting operation involving Lady Penelope, Kayo and a heavily disguised Parker gets blown prematurely by the GDF and Parker is taken prisoner by the panicking thief Banino. Banino takes off in a stolen GDF flyer with Kayo in pursuit in Thunderbird Shadow. It all ends in a crash landing in a factory - and International Rescue intervene. Scott, in Thunderbird 1, rescues one of the factory workers and Lady Penelope saves Parker. Kayo goes after Banino - but finds herself being blackmailed.

26.title: Legacy
26.plot: A number of carefully staged disasters require the full attention of everyone at International Rescue. Kayo discovers that the Hood is behind these acts of terrorism and has actually infiltrated Tracy Island. To make matters worse, the Hood has rigged up explosive devices to bring down the Thunderbird craft - and now he reveals his shocking secret to the Tracy brothers.

1.title: Earthbreaker
1.plot: A geological survey team gets trapped by a huge earth-breaking vehicle, International Rescue mobilize Thunderbirds 1, 2 and Shadow and the Global Defence Force tackle the problem.

2.title: Ghost Ship
2.plot: When GDF Captain Ridley O'Bannon investigates a derelict generation ship known as EDEN, things quickly take a turn for the worse.

3.title: Deep Search
3.plot: On Jupiter's moon Europa Buddy and Ellie Pendergast are searching for extra terrestrial life. When they start drilling into the ice pressure from geysers causes the ice to crack and they fall into an underground ocean below a ten mile thick layer of ice. Alan and Gordon blast off in Thunderbird 3, with Thunderbird 4 modified with skis, powerful engines and a heat drill to penetrate the ice, which they lose due to strong underwater currents. They find the Pendergasts, who have taken shelter in their rover, but before they leave they detect a lifeform. As their escape ...

4.title: City Under the Sea
4.plot: At Bay City, a town that was flooded due to global warming, the Mechanic, in a crab shaped submarine, is searching thought the ruins of the Creighton-Ward building for a safe containing the plans for Parkmoor Scrubs prison, so he can help the Hood to break out of it. As he smashes his way through some of the debris, it collides with a rental sub, which is being hired by the Sullivan family, coursing it to crash onto the seabed. While Gordon and Kayo work together to rescue the family, Lady Penelope and Parker try to get to the safe before the Mechanic gets to it first.

5.title: Colony
5.plot: Scott and Taylor help a ship full of would-be colonists reach Mars.

6.title: Up from the Depths: Part One
6.plot: Gordon ventures deep into the Marianas trench to rescue a survey team and ends up discovering an early International Rescue prototype once flown by Jeff.

7.title: Up from the Depths: Part Two
7.plot: When the Mechanic steals some volatile iridium, Brains must make drastic alterations to Thunderbird 3 to save the day.

8.title: Lost Kingdom
8.plot: When a transport ship carrying colonists heads straight into an asteroid belt, Thunderbird 3 is deployed to regain control.

9.title: Impact
9.plot: John and Ridley O'Bannon finish a game of Zero-G squash in space just before receiving some distressing news.

10.title: High Strung
10.plot: Scott attempts to rescue a mysterious aerialist when his hot air balloon crashes on the top of a mountain.

11.title: Weather or Not
11.plot: The team travels to Langstrom Fischler's newest invention to stop a hive of malfunctioning weather drones.

12.title: Fight or Flight
12.plot: A cargo Zeppelin called Baross suffers damage and is on a collision course with a city. To make matters worse, two crew members are unable to abandon ship because one of the ship's loading claws has malfunctioned and has started attacking anything that moves in the cargo bay. Scott and Virgil must try to pull the ship up from its crash course, while Kayo takes on the claw and rescues the crew.

13.title: Escape Proof
13.plot: A mysterious tunnelling vehicle leaves a worker trapped in its wake and it's up to Gordon and Virgil to free him while Parker and Lady Penelope track down the digger.

14.title: Volcano!
14.plot: Quentin Questa inaccurately predicted the eruption of a volcano for the past 10 years, only for Brains to find that this year he's actually right.

15.title: Power Play
15.plot: The Mechanic sabotages a dam and International Rescue must fix it before it floods.

16.title: Bolt from the Blue
16.plot: An orbiting solar energy station with Lady Penelope and Parker on board malfunctions. It endangers an airplane carrying a rare giant panda.

17.title: Attack of the Reptiles
17.plot: Buddy and Ellie Pendergast explore an unexplored African valley for their show "Into the Unknown". But instead of a great horned ape, they encounter giant reptiles and oversized tomatoes.

18.title: Grandma Tourismo
18.plot: Virgil and Grandma are shopping for supplies when two distress calls arise. Since they are nearest, Virgil sees to the workers of a collapsed mine while Grandma rescues a local merchant.

19.title: Clean Sweep
19.plot: International Rescue come to assist when an atmospheric cleaning device goes haywire, trapping crew inside. While the Tracy brothers work on freeing the crew, Parker goes solo and squares off against a figure from his past.

20.title: The Man from TB5
20.plot: While attending a gala with Lady Penelope, John must save the day when the Hood strikes and blocks all communications. Meanwhile, Gordon and Alan take John's place aboard the TB5, only to deal with a stubborn Eos.

21.title: Home on the Range
21.plot: Whilst testing new equipment at the family ranch, a series of equipment failures occur when the Tracys have to rescue an intruding reporter.

22.title: Long Haul
22.plot: Thunderbird 3 is called upon to save the life of the controller of the Moon cargo cargo station. Having to remain there to feed oxygen to the station, Thunderbird 2 is retro-fitted for space travel to deliver a new coolant core. But can Thunderbird 2 get back to earth in one piece?

23.title: Rigged for Disaster
23.plot: A decaying mid-ocean oil rig will be shut down by Lady Penelope. The rig's manager sabotages the rig to stop her. As the rig begins to collapse, Penelope, Parker, Kayo and Virgil rush to save trapped workers and stop disaster from striking.

24.title: Inferno
24.plot: The world's tallest building catches fire and the local firefighters are helpless. International Rescue must put out the fire and rescue everyone inside.

25.title: Hyperspeed
25.plot: The first journey by a brilliant inventor's new travel invention - the Hyperloop - malfunctions. Thunderbirds, specifically Scott Tracy, must find a way to save the day!

26.title: Brains vs. Brawn
26.plot: When the Mechanic tries to kill the Hood with a giant laser, IR must come to the rescue.

imdb.plot outline: Remake of the hit 1960's "Supermarionation" television show. In the 21st century, Jeff Tracy, a former astronaut, amasses a colossal fortune and decides that he must use it to benefit others. His answer to this desire is to create International Rescue, a unique private emergency response service equipped with customized designed vehicles and equipment that enable the organization to react to any crisis whether it be in sea, air, land, or space. Jeff's five sons volunteer to operate as the pilots and field agents, as well as "Brains" (real name unknown) who acts as the teams' technical developer and engineer. In addition, Jeff's friend, Kyrano and his daughter Tanusha aka Kayo (based on the original series Tin-Tin character) agree to be the support staff. In addition to the field team, IR also maintains an intelligence network with Lady Penelope Creighton-Ward and her ex-con chauffeur, Parker as the chief agents in this arm. The series depicts this team as they answer various calls for help around and beyond the world while they prevent enemies like the Hood, Uncle to Kayo, from learning and exploiting their secrets. We join the story when Jeff (and probably Kyrano) is missing - presumed dead - and his family are having to continue with his legacy still hoping he might be found safe. Kayo is now head of security and Grandma (who is a poor cook) is in charge of mealtimes!
imdb.title: Thunderbirds Are Go
plot: In the future, the Tracy family run a private mechanized emergency response service.::Kenneth Chisholm
